author: jgm
content:
An article on tracking net issuance on Ethereum 2: https://www.attestant.io/posts/exploring-net-issuance/

On my list to build out an API endpoint that provides this information, which would be handy for anyone that wants to talk about total supply of Ether.

author: ralexstokes
content: nice article! an API to quickly get this information would be great

author: ralexstokes
content: i was a bit confused when i saw "issuance rate" being so high as in my experience the common usage for that term refers to the overall supply increase in the currency (usually per annum terms)

author: ralexstokes
content: possibly consider something like "realized issuance" if this terminology ends up user-facing so we don't have the confusion we are double the eth supply every year ðŸ˜†
